title: SZA Unveils New Album LANA (SOS Deluxe): Stream
description: The reissue of the 2022 Grammy-winning project includes over a dozen new songs. SZA Unveils New Album LANA (SOS Deluxe): Stream Mary Siroky
author: Mary Siroky
excerpt: SZA has shared LANA, the deluxe version of her acclaimed album, SOS, featuring over a dozen new songs, including a track with Kendrick Lamar.
text: SZA has dropped the deluxe version of her Grammy-winning album SOS, titled LANA. Stream it below. LANA boasts 15 new tracks, including a collaboration with Kendrick Lamar titled “30 for 30.” Listeners will also find the 2024 release “Saturn” included on the album; the song was recently named one of the 200 best of the year as part of our Annual Report. Get SZA Tickets Here A few hours before the release of LANA, SZA also shared the eerie visual for “Drive,” which features an appearance from Ben Stiller. The actor-director and artist began a rapport on Twitter when SZA expressed her admiration for Severance, along with her anticipation around the new season. While much of LANA is in line with the energy of SOS, some of the songs are brighter, including the playful and upbeat “BMF.” On “Get Behind Me (Interlude),” she istinss that she won’t be brought down; other offerings, like “Crybaby” and “Drive,” lean back into a more introspective and restrained sound. Currently, SZA is prepping for a highly anticipated 21-date stadium tour with Kendrick Lamar, which is set to kick off in April. She’ll be joining forces with the rapper to bring the “Grand National Tour” to cities like Atlanta, Seattle, Los Angeles, and more. See the full tour details and grab tickets here. It’s set to be a busy 2025 for the vocalist, as she’s also expected to make her acting debut in a new film from Issa Rae. LANA (SOS Deluxe) Artwork: LANA (SOS Deluxe) Tracklist: 01. No More Hiding 02. What Do I Do 03. 30 for 30 (with Kendrick Lamar) 04. Diamond Boy (DTM) 05. BMF 06. Scorsese Baby Daddy 07. Love Me 4 Me 08. Chill Baby 09. My Turn 10. Crybaby 11. Kitchen 12. Get Behind Me (Interlude) 13. Drive 14. Another Life 15. Saturn
html:
SZA has dropped the deluxe version of her Grammy-winning album SOS, titled LANA. Stream it below.

LANA boasts 15 new tracks, including a collaboration with Kendrick Lamar titled “30 for 30.” Listeners will also find the 2024 release “Saturn” included on the album; the song was recently named one of the 200 best of the year as part of our Annual Report.

Get SZA Tickets Here

A few hours before the release of LANA, SZA also shared the eerie visual for “Drive,” which features an appearance from Ben Stiller. The actor-director and artist began a rapport on Twitter when SZA expressed her admiration for Severance, along with her anticipation around the new season.

While much of LANA is in line with the energy of SOS, some of the songs are brighter, including the playful and upbeat “BMF.” On “Get Behind Me (Interlude),” she istinss that she won’t be brought down; other offerings, like “Crybaby” and “Drive,” lean back into a more introspective and restrained sound.

Currently, SZA is prepping for a highly anticipated 21-date stadium tour with Kendrick Lamar, which is set to kick off in April. She’ll be joining forces with the rapper to bring the “Grand National Tour” to cities like Atlanta, Seattle, Los Angeles, and more. See the full tour details and grab tickets here.

It’s set to be a busy 2025 for the vocalist, as she’s also expected to make her acting debut in a new film from Issa Rae.

LANA (SOS Deluxe) Artwork:

LANA (SOS Deluxe) Tracklist:
01. No More Hiding
02. What Do I Do
03. 30 for 30 (with Kendrick Lamar)
04. Diamond Boy (DTM)
05. BMF
06. Scorsese Baby Daddy
07. Love Me 4 Me
08. Chill Baby
09. My Turn
10. Crybaby
11. Kitchen
12. Get Behind Me (Interlude)
13. Drive
14. Another Life
15. Saturn
